message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $18000. It's a fantastic deal considering its value and potential. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $16500, reflecting your interest and my desire to reach an agreement. Let's see if we can make this work.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with $16000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
